James typed at his computer, finishing up some work that he had to get done. He paused to rub his eyes and nearly fell out of his chair as his house rumbled violently. For anyone else it'd be a concern but for him it was normal. His son, Troy, was a rather... unique... guy. He had some kind of condition that made his growth go out of control once he hit puberty. Now in his 20s, Troy was an enormous mountain of a man that James loved and took care of.

Getting up, James left his office to take a look down the hall toward the living room. Once he opened the door he was hit by the hot, humid, and incredibly dense stink of past eaten meals. The rumbling he'd felt earlier was just one of Troy's frequent farts and the smell was never mild. He saw his body seated on the couch, eating from a bag of chips, beer in one hand, and the TV on.

Troy was, to put it mildly, enormous. He had to weigh at least 2 tons and had grown to at least 8 feet tall. His ass was wider than a compact car, meaning the couch he was on was custom ordered and had no room at all for James to sit on. Troy was also clad in gigantic, custom ordered clothes - a huge t-shirt and a gigantic pair of sweats that formed to every roll and bulge on his fat form. The shirt clung to his belly that sagged between his redwood sized thighs and the sweats hugged his door destroying hips and rank, gassy quadruple yoga ball ass cheeks. 13.title: Furry

choices: Jace puts out an ad for a room mate.
132.content:
Jace had been on his own for a while now, something that took some used to thanks to his condition, while he was growing up he was thankful his parents were so patient with him while he was growing up. When the rottweiler got of age and moved out they had been worried at first, but thankfully some measure of control over his 'eruptions' and some lucky timing managed to keep his neighbors from finding out about it. The house he had moved into was spacious enough for his needs and allowed him to work out to his hearts content, though with so much of his money being taken by it he was considering getting a room mate to help with the burden. He didn't doubt that they would find out about his little 'problem' before long and he could only hope they didn't run as fast as they could from him.

Sighing, he simply figured that he would have to deal with such a situation if it ever came to that, and with a low gurgle in his gut, enough to vibrating the chair he was sitting in and even the floor a bit, it was coming time for him to bleed off some pressure. He turned to the side, looking outside, bright sunny day, most everyone else that lived around him were at work and their kids were at school, which thankfully left him even fewer witnesses to what he might end up doing next. The rottweiler perked his ears up and sighed. Jace grunts and shifts, wearing little more than a pair of dark blue shorts and cocks his leg up, the swell of his round ass jutting out a hint. He chuckled, closing his eyes and let loose, a low rumbling burst of gas roared out of his butt, shaking his seat, his desk, hell the entire room was shuddering and shaking as though a minor earthquake was happening. The blast kept on coming, puttering loudly and growing way more than he wanted, the house shook, just as enough gas came out, the blast ended sharply, deafeningly loud and enough to set off a couple car alarms.

"Crap, maybe my neighbors will just think it was some freak accident." He hoped, even small releases of gas like that had ended up being way more powerful than he meant.

"Ugh, oh well the day calls."

choices: Jace and Mason open up to each other about their shared "quirks" and "talents"

13221.content:
Jace grinned a big, goofy grin when he discovered that a bear by the name of Mason had replied back to his ad! Mason stated that he was also looking for a roomie that was better suited for his own "quirks" as well, and that this sounded like the perfect opportunity. After some messaging back and forth, a hopeful Jace was pleased when they planned a visit at his house the following afternoon to discuss the terms. As the big rottweiler got up from the couch to get to his workout in the other room, he grinned as he hiked up his right leg a bit before before releasing another monstrous fart, not as big as his previous ones, but still massive, deep and long enough to rattle the windows a bit and fill the rooms of the house again with his rank stench. After tapering off after about 15 seconds, Jace simply sighed, still grinning stupidly before going to his bedroom to change, the massive bulge in his shorts bouncing and swaying with every movement and step before he left.

************

The next day, Jace couldn't deny that he was both nervous and excited for Mason to arrive on his front doorstep. As it was his day off from work the rottie was still chilling in his lounge wear which consisted of a simple T-shirt that showed off his huge chest, torso and biceps, and sweatpants that showed every curve of his massive beachball-sized hyper bulge. Jace had to admit that he was much more self-conscious about his potential new roommate discovering his titanic farts than he was discovering that he was a hyperfur - after all, to most letting rip so huge was much more embarrassing than your own anatomy that you were so used to.

The moment the front doorbell rang Jace had ripped a very loud but short fart into the sofa, vibrating it hard for a second and releasing even more of his musky odor into the air. The big rottweiler chuckled nervously, hoping that Mason hadn't heard too much of it and the smell would dissipate quickly. Anxiously he opened the door and was greeted by a massive wall of furry dark brown muscle - he was quite shocked!

Jace thought he was extremely tall at 6'5", but the bear was more than a head taller than him and had to be over 7 feet tall! Mason was much more than an impressive specimen of a bear - he too was wearing a T-shirt that accentuated his titanic pecs, rippling abs and gigantic biceps, and a pair of oversized jeans that seemed he could barely fit into with his massive quads and an even bigger and over-inflated package than Mason's! It certainly took something special in his willpower for Jace not to get a nosebleed!

Mason had to crouch down under the door to enter the threshold of the house, and Jace backed up, the rottie taking in the breathtaking sight of the titanic bear. But as soon as Mason stepped inside he squinted his eyes, sniffing the air before pinching his nose closed with his thick fingers and waving the air. Jace gulped, horrified - he knew he should've had a much smaller protein shake for breakfast! His gut lurched with fear and embarrassment; what would the big bear say and do when he found about his new roomie's frequent (and utterly massive) gas blasts?

But to his utter surprise and shock, Mason withdrew his hands from his face and chuckled, instead taking a deep, long whiff of the rotten air and sighing deeply. "Ahhhh...not too bad pup!" the beefy bear said in his deep, manly voice. "Did ya have the morning protein shake as well? Impressive, but take a look at this!" Mason exclaimed, immediately jutting out his massive, beefy ass in tight jeans and letting rip with the single loudest, longest, and deepest fart Jace had ever experienced in his entire life! The big rottie had to rush to hastily close the front door as the massive earth-shaking rumbler thundered on and on, quaking the house and no doubt entire neighborhood - furniture rumbled and toppled, shelving vibrated and shook, and outside the whole block rumbled and multiple car alarms went off, blaring.

Jace simply stood there rooted to the spot, stunned. He wasn't sure how to react as Mason laughed, taking another deep breath of the now incredibly rank air and commenting on the smell and how good that casual rip of his felt while he could hear the neighborhoods outside vocally complained about the small earthquake that seemingly came out of nowhere.

1331.content:
Alex hadn't hung out with his best bud for a couple of days, and thought they should catch up again some time soon, the tall skunk had managed to make quite a few friends that dealt with his output well enough. The closest among them was a human that he had met when he was younger, ironically being one of the people that he had ended up blowing over with one of his belches. Bryan didn't hold it against him, and despite smelling like some errant gas for the next two days had tried to get to know the skunk better.

Alex had left his house, knowing exactly where to find the human Tuesday, of all days and went to the park, wearing little more than a button up shirt and some shorts and sandals. He went on to find his bud and smirked, having something for a reputation for routinely gassing up the entire block and then some had left quite a number of others wary of him. The skunk sighed, stopping at the entrance to the park and glanced around, spotting the human in the middle of it, sitting on a bench and reading a book.

"Hey, Bryan!" The skunk yelled loudly enough to get everyone's attention.

Once they saw him how ever a few people make a quick exit, rushing off to get as far away as possible, and the human for his part just looked up and smiled, preparing himself. Just to bleed off some pressure, the skunk turned his head off to the side, and ran a hand over his own gut, unleashing a long, roaring belch out of his maw, the long burp came out with such power that the very ground vibrated, and the bush he had his muzzle pointed at titled away as if it were being blown in a hurricane. He kept the belch coming out for a few moments, almost a minute straight, and it echoed all around the park.

"HURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRMMMPPP, ugh!" He chuckled as the gale of wind coming from his maw died down, the bush having been stripped bare as he walked along, thick tail swaying behind him.

Bryan for his part chuckled, and thought to himself 'at least he hasn't started farting yet. The skunk stopped right in front of him, the grin grown wide on his muzzle as he patted his own stomach and grinned.

"Hey bud, let's go have some fun!"

People hurried out of the way as a huge shadow was cast over the street and the football team sighed as they looked at what it was that was getting closer. "He's here..." sighed one of the football team members.

"Ah... Always kinda nice to rip them small ones," he said as he winked.
14211.title: Fat

Puck just smiled and laughed as he began his trek onward, not even caring.

info.brief_description: A collection of male hyper farting and burping stories, both human and furry.
info.description:
Ground Rules:

-All characters involved must be 18+.

-Only male characters are allowed in these stories. No female characters!

-Guys of all shapes and sizes, both fictional, non-fictional, and even furry are allowed.

-Most if not all farts and burps should be of the "hyper" variety; in other words, these gas explosions should be big enough and powerful enough to rumble entire sofas, rooms, houses...even entire neighborhoods and cities! Massive, huge, deep, long, and rumbling...get creative and think BIG.

-Other fetishes are allowed, but try to stick to the lines of weight gain/fat, slob, macro/growth, butt growth, and hyper. And please nothing too obscene or graphic.

-Please be descriptive in your storytelling. A good chapter addition should be at least a well-developed paragraph in length. No chapters with just a few sentences or less (unless they are choice chapters - and even then try to be descriptive and explain the choices).

-And as always, good spelling and grammar are very much appreciated.


Come on in and have some hyper gassy fun!
